snippet.title: My Little Life - Reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam to get notified on release.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2834600/My_Little_Life/

My Little Life is a life simulator that lives on the bottom of your screen, allowing you to focus on other tasks while periodically checking on your own little person.

Created by 9FingerGames. The developer beind Zapling Bygone and Heretic's Fork.
